title: Bedcover, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: patchwork of printed plain weave
description: Patchwork bedcover composed of printed cottons with floral stripes and plaid motifs. Lined with another printed cotton of vertical stripes with floral motifs in green, light and dark brown.
